definition: first day of lunar month/New Year's Day/first year in junior middle school
at first/(at the) beginning/first/junior/basic
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
New Year's Day in the lunar calendar
lit. you may go undetected during the new moon, but at full moon you'll be found out (idiom)/fig. you can't put it off forever/sooner or later you'll have to deal with it
pinyin: duo3 de5 guo4 chu1 yi1 , duo3 bu4 guo4 shi2 wu3
containing_words.word: 躲得過初一，躲不過十五

definition: see 躲得過初一，躲不過十五|躲得过初一，躲不过十五[duo3 de5 guo4 chu1 yi1 , duo3 bu4 guo4 shi2 wu3]
pinyin: duo3 guo4 chu1 yi1 , duo3 bu4 guo4 shi2 wu3

sentences.english: The result indicated that most of primary school leavers had the deficiencies of primary-secondary.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現，初一新生普遍存在升學準備不足的狀況。

sentences.english: Visiting relatives is still considered a major event on the first day of the first Lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 延續自大年夜，拜年依然是大年初一的重要活動。

sentences.english: You can ask all the sec 1 students, now all their classes have been changed to self-revision.
sentences.chinese: 你可以打聽一下初一年級的學生，他們的課都自習了。
初一英語下冊第七課《他是什麼樣子？

sentences.english: You can run but you sure can’t outrun fate.
sentences.chinese: 你可以躲，但你肯定躲得過初一躲不過十五。

sentences.english: From the first day of the seventh month began they to offer burnt offerings unto the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 從七月初一日起，他們就向耶和華獻燔祭。

sentences.english: I am a 7th Grade student in No.3 high school in Shandong.
sentences.chinese: 我是山東第三中學初一的學生。

sentences.english: First day just crossed, as soon as spring then treadonned the rabbit year threshold.
sentences.chinese: 初一剛過，春天便一腳踏進了兔年的門檻。

sentences.english: By midnight, New Year, firecrackers sounded the street.
sentences.chinese: 到了十二點，大年初一了，街上響起鞭炮聲。

sentences.english: There are few junior high school students, especially Grade 7 students in the studies.
sentences.chinese: 對初中學生，特別是初一學生進行的研究不多。

sentences.english: On the New Year's Day, people get up early and say good words to anyone they meet.
sentences.chinese: 大年初一，人們通常會早起，會與見到的人說吉祥話。

sentences.english: This Lunar New Year's Day, and his party boarded the four time the plane flew to Jingzhou.
sentences.chinese: 這樣大年初一，一行四人準時登上了飛往荊州的專機。

sentences.english: This week hoisted a flag the ceremony finally to manage by our Class Two, Grade One.
sentences.chinese: 本週一的升旗儀式由我們初一年級二班來主持。

sentences.english: It was started on the first day of the Bengali New Year.
sentences.chinese: 該車於孟加拉新年初一首發。

sentences.english: I am arranged to invigilate Junior one's history test.
sentences.chinese: 我被安排了監考初一的歷史。

sentences.english: On New Year's Day all Chinese children wear new clothes with bright colours.
sentences.chinese: 大年初一，孩子們都穿上顏色鮮豔的新衣服。
